content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal.

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport System at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore.
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to the chest and other entities.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing iron ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring iron ore from the mining drill to the chest.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing coal, iron ore, and iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items between chests.

### Iron Plate Processing Facility at Position (-19.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) transferring iron plates from the furnace to the chest.

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of multiple BeltGroups connecting various entities:
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-25.5, -70.5) to (-23.5, -70.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-18.5, -71.5) to (-16.5, -71.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-26.5, -68.5) to (-24.5, -68.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-26.5, -69.5) to (-23.5, -69.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-26.5, -67.5) to (-24.5, -67.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-26.5, -66.5) to (-22.5, -66.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-21.5, -68.5) to (-21.5, -66.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-24.5, -65.5) to (-21.5, -65.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-13.5, -61.5) to (-13.5, -63.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-12.5, -54.5) to (-12.5, -56.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Picking Up Entities
- Ensure the entity you want to pick up exists at the specified position before attempting to pick it up.

### Errors with Furnace Inventory
- Verify that the furnace is receiving the necessary ingredients, such as iron ore, to prevent assertion errors related to missing ingredients.

### Errors with Output Blockage
- Ensure that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output from mining drills to avoid blockage errors.

### Errors with Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserter has source items available to pick up to avoid waiting status.
